headline: 8 Summery BBQ Sides
short descr: From fresh salads to grilled veggies and seasonal gratins, we've got eight festive dishes to round out your barbecues all summer long.
image_caption(s): Dilled, Crunchy Sweet-Corn Salad With Buttermilk Dressing
article: So, you've got your burgers ready to go on the grill, and now it's time to whip up some summery sides. From fresh salads to grilled veggies and seasonal gratins, we've got eight festive dishes to round out your barbecues all summer long. Brought to you by the spirited home cooks' community at Food52.• See more recipes for summery sides on Food52.  • Browse our menu for a BBQ feast.  • Got a question in the kitchen? headline: Nicki Minaj, Katy Perry And 40 More Stars In Stripes (PHOTOS)
short descr: The repeated pattern brings us back to the days of auto racing in the 1950s when they were a means of identification. And
image_caption(s): Hourglass: Show off your narrow waist with a wide band at your midsection.
article: It's an outbreak. No, not mosquitoes or (shudder) bedbugs. This summer, the widespread phenomenon is stripes. We are seeing them in every color and incarnation, from bright pink maxi dresses to the original navy and white boat neck version. People of all ages are on trend: Women in their 50s are wearing crisp Oxford shirts with thin bands, while my three-year-old son loves his blue stripes.The repeated pattern brings us back to the days of auto racing in the 1950s when they were a means of identification. And who could forget Elvis Presley in "Jailhouse Rock"? Saint-James, the knitwear company named after the community in northern France, is also known for its striped tops from the 1970s. They have experienced a renaissance of sorts and are now available in the most American of stores: J.Crew. What makes them so popular now? Nautical styles always pop up in summer because we are all trying to get as close to the water as possible, so if that means donning Sperry Top-Siders with your lobster belt and seersucker trousers in the middle of Manhattan while dreaming of Nantucket, so be it. But the old adage of horizontal stripes having a widening effect can be true. So are they suitable for everyone? Here, five tips on wearing stripes, plus 42 celebrities in the popular pattern. Want more? Be sure to check out Stylelist on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr and Pinterest.

headline: 8 Spring Roll Recipes For Summer
short descr: It happens every year. When the weather gets warmer, we crave lighter foods. But there are only so many salads we can eat
image_caption(s): Vegetable Summer Rolls With Chile-Lime Dipping Sauce
article: It happens every year. When the weather gets warmer, we crave lighter foods. But there are only so many salads we can eat before we start to get bored of our dining options. That's where the spring and summer rolls come in (they are essentially the same thing). Common in Asian cuisines, these light rolls are usually made up of rice paper filled with raw vegetables, fresh herbs and fish, shrimp or chicken. They hit the spot on a warm summer evening. And if you want something a little heartier, you can fry them and fill them with savory meats.
